languages.text: "Да мы все рассказали еще там, на площади... Худо на Кьяве Гамма все. Может статься, и совсем ее нет уже. Напали на нее полчища еретиков, кричали нечестивые молитвы, резали людей. Нам на орбите все слышно было — ловили {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-передачи одну за другой. Поняли, что не помочь там никому уже, решили бежать... и тут на нашу команду будто безумие снизошло. Капитан сам себе голову о {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g} разбил, половина офицеров — тоже. Все, кто выжил, корабль кое-как увели в {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g} и добрались сюда..."

"We told you everything back in the square... Things are rough on Kiava Gamma. Maybe there isn't even a Kiava Gamma anymore. The planet was attacked by a horde of heretics — they shouted unholy prayers and cut down people left and right. We heard everything from orbit, listening to one {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-cast after another. We realised there wasn't anyone left to save, so we thought we'd run... but then it was like our crew went mad somehow. The captain smashed his own head against a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, and so did half of the officers. Everyone who survived did their best to steer the ship into the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} and here we are..."
languages.original_text: "Да мы все рассказали еще там, на площади... Худо на Кьяве Гамма все. Может статься, и совсем ее нет уже. Напали на нее полчища еретиков, кричали нечестивые молитвы, резали людей. Нам на орбите все слышно было — ловили {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-передачи одну за другой. Поняли, что не помочь там никому уже, решили бежать... и тут на нашу команду будто безумие снизошло. Капитан сам себе голову о {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатор{/g} разбил, половина офицеров — тоже. Все, кто выжил, корабль кое-как увели в {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g} и добрались сюда..."

traits.locale_text: "We've told you everything already, back there in the square... Things are rough on Kiava Gamma. Maybe there no longer is a Kiava Gamma. The planet was attacked by a horde of heretics, they were shouting unholy prayers to the Archenemy, cutting people left and right. We heard everything up on the orbit, listening to one vox transmission after another. We realized there wasn't anyone left to save, so we thought we'd run... but then it's like our crew went mad somehow. The captain smashed his own head against a cogitator, and so did half of the officers. Everyone who survived did their best to steer the ship into the warp and made their way here..."
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

traits.locale_text: "We've told you everything already, back there in the square... Things are rough on Kiava Gamma. Maybe there no longer is a Kiava Gamma. The planet was attacked by a horde of heretics, they were shouting unholy prayers to the Archenemy, cutting people left and right. We heard everything up on the orbit, listening to one vox transmission after another. We realized there wasn't anyone left to save, so we thought we'd run... but then it's like our crew went mad somehow. Everyone who survived did their best to steer the ship into the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} and here we are..."
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

languages.text: 「広場でお話ししたとおりです…キアヴァ・ガンマのは最悪の状態にあります。もはやキアヴァ・ガンマと呼ぶのもふさわしくないかもしれません。あの惑星は異端者の大群に襲われました――奴らは邪悪な祈りを叫び、次々と人を殺しました。私たちは{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音声通信送受信装置{/g}を通じて、軌道上から一部始終を聞いていました。救助できるものは誰も残っていないことに気づき、逃走をはかりましたが…なぜかクルーが正気を失ってしまったのです。船長は自身の頭を{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}に叩きつけて、他の士官たちも同じような行動を起こしました。生き残った者たちは必死に船を{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}〈歪み〉{/g}まで誘導し、ここにたどり着きました…」
languages.original_text: "We told you everything back in the square... Things are rough on Kiava Gamma. Maybe there isn't even a Kiava Gamma anymore. The planet was attacked by a horde of heretics — they shouted unholy prayers and cut down people left and right. We heard everything from orbit, listening to one {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-cast after another. We realised there wasn't anyone left to save, so we thought we'd run... but then it was like our crew went mad somehow. The captain smashed his own head against a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, and so did half of the officers. Everyone who survived did their best to steer the ship into the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} and here we are..."

traits.locale_text: 「広場でお話ししたとおりです…キアヴァ・ガンマのは最悪の状態にあります。もはやキアヴァ・ガンマと呼ぶのもふさわしくないかもしれません。あの惑星は異端者の大群に襲われました――奴らは邪悪な祈りを叫び、次々と人を殺しました。私たちは{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音声通信送受信装置{/g}を通じて、軌道上から一部始終を聞いていました。救助できるものは誰も残っていないことに気づき、逃走をはかりましたが…なぜかクルーが正気を失ってしまったのです。船長は自身の頭を{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}に叩きつけて、他の士官たちも同じような行動を起こしました。生き残った者たちは必死に船を{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}〈歪み〉{/g}まで誘導し、ここにたどり着きました…」
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

languages.text: “在广场的时候，我们就已经把一切都告诉你了……基亚瓦伽马星的情况很糟糕，说不定它已经不复存在了。整颗行星遭到了一大群异端分子的袭击。他们高喊着邪恶的祷文，大肆屠杀人类。我们从轨道上听到了一切，听着一个又一个的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}通讯传来。我们意识到那些人已经没救了，就打算赶紧逃走……但不知怎么的，我们的船员好像也发疯了。舰长一头撞死了在{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}上，还有一半的军官也遭受了同样的厄运。每个幸存者都尽了最大的努力，才把船开进了{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}，然后我们就到了这里……”
languages.original_text: "We told you everything back in the square... Things are rough on Kiava Gamma. Maybe there isn't even a Kiava Gamma anymore. The planet was attacked by a horde of heretics — they shouted unholy prayers and cut down people left and right. We heard everything from orbit, listening to one {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-cast after another. We realised there wasn't anyone left to save, so we thought we'd run... but then it was like our crew went mad somehow. The captain smashed his own head against a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, and so did half of the officers. Everyone who survived did their best to steer the ship into the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} and here we are..."

traits.locale_text: “在广场的时候，我们就已经把一切都告诉你了……基亚瓦伽马星的情况很糟糕，说不定它已经不复存在了。整颗行星遭到了一大群异端分子的袭击。他们高喊着邪恶的祷文，大肆屠杀人类。我们从轨道上听到了一切，听着一个又一个的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}通讯传来。我们意识到那些人已经没救了，就打算赶紧逃走……但不知怎么的，我们的船员好像也发疯了。舰长一头撞死了在{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}思考器{/g}上，还有一半的军官也遭受了同样的厄运。每个幸存者都尽了最大的努力，才把船开进了{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}，然后我们就到了这里……”
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

languages.text: «Ya le contamos todo en la plaza... El panorama en Kiava Gamma es asolador. Puede que incluso ya ni exista. Una horda de herejes atacó el planeta: clamaban plegarias impías y mutilaban a cualquiera que se interpusiera. Lo oímos todo mientras estábamos en órbita, {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} a voco. Nos dimos cuenta de que no quedaba nadie a quien salvar y que lo mejor era huir... hasta que no sabemos cómo, pero nuestra tripulación empezó a enloquecer. El capitán se reventó la cabeza contra un {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} y la mitad de los oficiales le siguieron el ejemplo. Todos los supervivientes nos dejamos la piel para llevar la nave a la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} y aquí estamos...».
languages.original_text: "We told you everything back in the square... Things are rough on Kiava Gamma. Maybe there isn't even a Kiava Gamma anymore. The planet was attacked by a horde of heretics — they shouted unholy prayers and cut down people left and right. We heard everything from orbit, listening to one {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-cast after another. We realised there wasn't anyone left to save, so we thought we'd run... but then it was like our crew went mad somehow. The captain smashed his own head against a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, and so did half of the officers. Everyone who survived did their best to steer the ship into the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} and here we are..."

traits.locale_text: «Ya le contamos todo en la plaza... El panorama en Kiava Gamma es asolador. Puede que incluso ya ni exista. Una horda de herejes atacó el planeta: clamaban plegarias impías y mutilaban a cualquiera que se interpusiera. Lo oímos todo mientras estábamos en órbita, {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} a voco. Nos dimos cuenta de que no quedaba nadie a quien salvar y que lo mejor era huir... hasta que no sabemos cómo, pero nuestra tripulación empezó a enloquecer. El capitán se reventó la cabeza contra un {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} y la mitad de los oficiales le siguieron el ejemplo. Todos los supervivientes nos dejamos la piel para llevar la nave a la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} y aquí estamos...».
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

languages.text: « Nous vous avons tout raconté sur la place... La situation est grave sur Kiava Gamma, si tant est que ce monde existe encore. La planète a été attaquée par une horde d'hérétiques qui se sont mis à abattre les gens à tour de bras en hurlant des prières impies. Nous avons écouté toutes leurs transmissions-{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} pendant que nous étions en orbite. Quand nous avons compris qu'il n'y avait plus personne à sauver, nous avons décidé de prendre la fuite... mais de façon inexplicable, notre équipage est devenu fou. Le capitaine s'est fendu le crâne contre un {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} et la moitié des officiers l'ont imité. Les survivants ont fait de leur mieux pour faire entrer le vaisseau dans le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}, et c'est comme ça que nous sommes arrivés ici... »
languages.original_text: "We told you everything back in the square... Things are rough on Kiava Gamma. Maybe there isn't even a Kiava Gamma anymore. The planet was attacked by a horde of heretics — they shouted unholy prayers and cut down people left and right. We heard everything from orbit, listening to one {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-cast after another. We realised there wasn't anyone left to save, so we thought we'd run... but then it was like our crew went mad somehow. The captain smashed his own head against a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, and so did half of the officers. Everyone who survived did their best to steer the ship into the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} and here we are..."

traits.locale_text: « Nous vous avons tout raconté sur la place... La situation est grave sur Kiava Gamma, si tant est que ce monde existe encore. La planète a été attaquée par une horde d'hérétiques qui se sont mis à abattre les gens à tour de bras en hurlant des prières impies. Nous avons écouté toutes leurs transmissions-{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} pendant que nous étions en orbite. Quand nous avons compris qu'il n'y avait plus personne à sauver, nous avons décidé de prendre la fuite... mais de façon inexplicable, notre équipage est devenu fou. Le capitaine s'est fendu le crâne contre un {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} et la moitié des officiers l'ont imité. Les survivants ont fait de leur mieux pour faire entrer le vaisseau dans le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}, et c'est comme ça que nous sommes arrivés ici... »
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

languages.text: "Wir haben Euch alles schon auf dem Platz erzählt ... Die Lage auf Kiava Gamma ist prekär. Vielleicht gibt es Kiava Gamma schon gar nicht mehr. Der Planet wurde von einer Horde von Ketzern angegriffen – sie brüllten unheilige Gebete und metzelten allerorten Leute dahin. Wir haben aus dem Orbit alles gehört, durch eine {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}-Übertragung nach der anderen. Wir erkannten, dass es niemanden mehr gab, den wir retten könnten, also sind wir geflohen ... aber dann ist unsere Crew irgendwie wahnsinnig geworden. Der Captain schlug sich selbst den Schädel an einem {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g} ein, genau wie die Hälfte der Offiziere. Alle Überlebenden haben ihr Bestes, um das Schiff in den {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} zu steuern, und jetzt sind wir hier ..."
languages.original_text: "We told you everything back in the square... Things are rough on Kiava Gamma. Maybe there isn't even a Kiava Gamma anymore. The planet was attacked by a horde of heretics — they shouted unholy prayers and cut down people left and right. We heard everything from orbit, listening to one {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-cast after another. We realised there wasn't anyone left to save, so we thought we'd run... but then it was like our crew went mad somehow. The captain smashed his own head against a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, and so did half of the officers. Everyone who survived did their best to steer the ship into the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} and here we are..."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben Euch alles schon auf dem Platz erzählt ... Die Lage auf Kiava Gamma ist prekär. Vielleicht gibt es Kiava Gamma schon gar nicht mehr. Der Planet wurde von einer Horde von Ketzern angegriffen – sie brüllten unheilige Gebete und metzelten allerorten Leute dahin. Wir haben aus dem Orbit alles gehört, durch eine {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}-Übertragung nach der anderen. Wir erkannten, dass es niemanden mehr gab, den wir retten könnten, also sind wir geflohen ... aber dann ist unsere Crew irgendwie wahnsinnig geworden. Der Captain schlug sich selbst den Schädel an einem {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g} ein, genau wie die Hälfte der Offiziere. Alle Überlebenden haben ihr Bestes, um das Schiff in den {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} zu steuern, und jetzt sind wir hier ..."
traits.speaker: Footfall_RefugeeForgeWorld

languages.text: "Daha önce size her şeyi anlatmıştık. Kiava Gama'da işler yolunda gitmiyor. Belki artık Kiava Gama diye bir yer kalmamıştır bile. Gezegene kâfirler saldırdı. Hayırsız dualarını okudular ve dört bir yanda halkımızı yok ettiler. Yörüngeden her şeyi duyduk, {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g} yayınlarını ardı ardına dinledik. Kurtarılacak kimse kalmadığını anlayınca kaçmaya karar verdik. Sonra ekibimiz âdeta delirdi. Kaptan ve subayların yarısı başlarını {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayara{/g} vurmaya başladı. Sağ kalanlar gemiyi {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyuta{/g} yönlendirmek için elinden geleni yaptı. Şimdi de buradayız işte..."
languages.original_text: "We told you everything back in the square... Things are rough on Kiava Gamma. Maybe there isn't even a Kiava Gamma anymore. The planet was attacked by a horde of heretics — they shouted unholy prayers and cut down people left and right. We heard everything from orbit, listening to one {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-cast after another. We realised there wasn't anyone left to save, so we thought we'd run... but then it was like our crew went mad somehow. The captain smashed his own head against a {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}, and so did half of the officers. Everyone who survived did their best to steer the ship into the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} and here we are..."

Hayırsız dualarını okudular ve dört bir yanda halkımızı yok ettiler. Yörüngeden her şeyi duyduk, {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g} yayınlarını ardı ardına dinledik.
